string-array.name: dialogArray
string-array.item: You came across an abandoned camp ground…
You found a half-eaten deer carcass…
You saw a cache of food strung up in a tree…

string-array.name: resultA
string-array.item: You inspect the camp, and in typical Goldilocks fashion, a zombie family comes back from their hike in the woods and attacks. Bummer.
The deer corpse reanimates! A zombie deer, who would\'ve thought?
You cut it down and open the box. Unfortunately, someone lives an alternative lifestyle…

string-array.name: resultB
string-array.item: Probably for the best—there\'s still steam coming from the campfire…
Did you just see it twitch…? Better pick up the speed…
You\'re right, someone put in the work to hoist all that up there. However, you found something on the ground! All not is lost!

string-array.name: difficultyDescriptions
string-array.item: WALK IN THE PARK: Great place to start. Required steps per day start at around 5,000.
WALK THE LINE: For those looking to step it up. Required steps per day start at around 7,000.
WALK THE TALK: Not for the faint of heart. Required steps per day start at around 10,000.
